SELECT bkg_no bkgNo, user_id userId, bt.trgt_no trgtNo,trgt_nm targetNm, concat(bkg_start_ymd, ' ', bkg_start_time) bkgStartTime, concat(bkg_end_ymd, ' ', bkg_end_time) bkgEndTime, trgt_info trgtInfo, save_filename saveFilename, path FROM booking bk, booking_target bt WHERE bk.trgt_no = bt.trgt_no
